title: China G.D.P. Data Is Unexpectedly Released After Delay
description: China said its economy grew 3.9 percent in the third quarter. But investors unnerved by Xi Jinping’s power grab — and his state-heavy agenda — sent Chinese shares tumbling.
dc:creator: Keith Bradsher and Alexandra Stevenson
media:credit: Gilles Sabrié for The New York Times
media:description: A Beijing vegetable market last month. China on Monday reported a modest rebound in economic activity for the quarter ending in September.
